[ { \"uniqueID\" : \"aethers.notebook.appender.managed.file.FileAppender\", \"name\" : \"File Appender\", \"description\" : \"Appends log messages to the filesystem.\", \"serviceClass\" : \"aethers.notebook.appender.managed.file.FileAppender\", \"configurable\" : true, \"enabled\" : false, \"builtin\" : true, \"deleted\" : false, \"version\" : 1 }, { \"uniqueID\" : \"aethers.notebook.appender.managed.uploader.UploaderAppender\", \"name\" : \"Uploader Appender\", \"description\" : \"Pushes log messages to a remote server.\", \"serviceClass\" : \"aethers.notebook.appender.managed.uploader.UploaderAppender\", \"configurable\" : true, \"enabled\" : false, \"builtin\" : true, \"deleted\" : false, \"version\" : 1 } ]
